maqras.text: They said, "He is not alone! His brother, too, had committed a theft earlier." Yusuf swallowed that remark and disclosed nothing. In his heart, he said, "You are indeed, of an evil status! And Allah knows what you describe
They said, "Oh chief, his father is really very old. Keep one of us in his stead! We find you to be a kind hearted person
Said, "May Allah help us! We can only keep the one, in whose baggage we found the stolen goods. We may not keep any one else! Otherwise, we will be the transgressors

They failed to convince Yusuf, and consulted each other. The oldest brother said (to others), "Do you not know? Father had obtained a firm oath upon Allah from you. And earlier, in Yusuf´s case, you had been neglectful. I will not leave this place until my father permits me, or until Allah decides my fate. He is the Best of the judges
Go back to your father and tell him, "Oh father, your son committed a theft. We say only what we know, and we could not have foreseen the future! We could not protect him from the unseen
Ask the people of the town we were in, or others in our caravan. We are telling the truth

(The father) said, "Rather, your evil spirits made it easier for you (to say that)! I will bear with patience, the utmost patience! Allah might still bring both of my sons back to me. Surely, He is the All-knower and the All-wise
He turned away from them and said, "Alas! Poor Yusuf!" He tried to hide his feelings, but his eyes turned white with grief
They said, "By Allah, you would never quit talking about Yusuf, until you either die or melt away
Said, "I complain only to Allah about my grief and anxiety. I know that about Allah, which you do not know
Oh my sons! Go look for Yusuf and his brother. Do not give up hope. Have faith in the mercy of Allah. Surely, only the disbelievers lose hope in the mercy of Allah

When they visited Yusuf again, they said, "Oh Chief, we and our families have come upon some hard times. We have brought our humble assets. Please be charitable and let us have the full measure of grain. Allah, surely, rewards those who are charitable
He said, "Now do you realize what you had done to Yusuf and his brother in your ignorance, earlier

They asked, "Are you really Yusuf?" Said, "I am. And this is my brother! Allah has bestowed favors upon us. Surely, Allah does not waste the reward of the pious, those who fear Him and remain steadfast
They remarked, "We swear by Allah! He chose you over us. We were clearly the wrong-doers
(Yusuf) said, "There is no censure, today. Allah will forgive you. And He is absolutely the most Forgiving of all
Take this shirt of mine and place it over my father´s eyes! It will bring back his sight! And bring all your families to me
And when the caravan moved (from Egypt) their father said, "Call me senile, but I am beginning to smell the scent of Yusuf
They said, "By Allah, you are still obsessed by that same old thing
The bearer of good news arrived and placed the shirt over his face. His sight was restored forthwith. Said, "Did I not tell you? I know that about Allah, which you do not know
They said, "Oh our father, pray for our forgiveness. We surely, are the sinners
Said, "I will ask my Lord to forgive you. He is really the most Forgiving and the most Merciful
When they came to Yusuf, he raised his parents to the throne with him, saying, "Welcome to Egypt, God willing, in peace

He helped his parents up to the throne with him; and they all fell down prostrate before him! He said, "Oh Father! This is what I saw in my dream earlier. My Lord has made it all come true. He blessed me, when He took me out of prison, and again when He brought all of you to me from the village, even though Shaitan had sowed discord between me and my brothers. Surely, my Lord is extremely kind to whomever He pleases, and surely, He is the All-knower and the Wise
